revised_title: Exploring New Particles and Quantum Numbers in High-Energy Neutrino Interactions
tldr: The article discusses the discovery of new particles and quantum numbers in high-energy neutrino interactions. The authors describe experiments using neutrino and antineutrino beams, and discuss the production and decay of new hadronic states. These findings suggest the existence of hadrons carrying new quantum numbers and a fundamental coupling to strangeness, potentially leading to new discoveries in particle physics.
